description: Mister M, the internationally acclaimed, award-winning juggling performer and author, presents the fantastic 3 and 5 ball juggling sets. The juggling balls are of the highest quality with a durable coating and eco-friendly padding. Suitable for beginners and professionals alike, the set comes with a dedicated app and video tutorials to help you learn the art of juggling easily and effectively. Why learn and engage in the art of juggling? Juggling is not only a fun and entertaining activity for children, it can also help youths and adults combat stress by both training fine motor skills and connecting the two hemispheres of the brain, thus promoting creativity and the ability to concentrate. Mister M has been performing and juggling on stages all over the world for 25 years and has since turned to designing and selling juggling products. For 11 years, high quality and affordable prices have been the key to Mister M's success as a juggling brand. "I didn't reinvent the wheel, but I aim to continuously improve it through my experience", says Mister M. Through his videos, which are included with the purchase of his juggling equipment, Mister M shows with passion and humour how to fly and keep juggling balls and scarves, diabolos and devil sticks in the air and at the same time do something good for your body and mind.
